    • Method Detail

      • doCallback

        public static <T> void doCallback(java.lang.Object _owner,
                  java.lang.String _function,
                  java.lang.Class<T> _dataType,
                  java.lang.Object _data)
        This utility function is the heart of the callbacks used in this library. It uses reflection to find the given function on the _owner with the _data type as parameter. It will log an error if it can't invoke the function for some reason. All callbacks run in their own thread not on the ui thread.
        Parameters:
        _owner - The object to look for the function on, and invoke the function on
        _function - The function name to look for and invoked
        _dataType - The data type of the parameter for the function to look for
        _data - the data to pass into the function when its invoked

      • getPixelFromDp

        public static int getPixelFromDp(int _dp,
                 float _scale)
        Converts a dp value to a pixel value for the device
        Parameters:
        _dp - the dp value to convert
        _scale - the value returned by a call getResources().getDisplayMetrics().density, passed in from the calling activity
        Returns:
        the number of pixels represented by the dp values
